meanings.definition: Cook (food) on a rack over charcoal.
meanings.sent1: Dad chargrills the burgers for our barbecue.
meanings.sent2: I love how the restaurant chargrills their steaks to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The chef chargrills the vegetables with flair and finesse.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of chargrilled meat wafted through the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the chargrills filled the air with anticipation.

meanings.definition: A grill used for cooking food over charcoal.
meanings.sent1: We bought a new chargrill for our outdoor parties.
meanings.sent2: The chargrill at the park is always busy during weekends.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse peeked out from under the chargrill, looking for crumbs.
meanings.sent4: The chargrill stood proudly in the backyard, ready for the next barbecue.
meanings.sent5: The flames danced beneath the chargrill, casting a warm glow.
